import React from 'react' import { forecastType } from '../types' type Props = { data: forecastType } const Degree = ({ temp }: { temp: number }): JSX.Element => ( {temp}o ) const Forecast = ({ data }: Props): JSX.Element => { const today = data.list[0] return (

{data.name} {data.country}

{today.weather[0].main} {today.weather[0].description}

H: L:

{data.list.map((item, i) => (

{item.dt}

))}
) } export default Forecast
